General.Name: Kristal Kola ve Mesrubat Sanayi Ticaret AS
General.Description: Kristal Kola ve Mesrubat Sanayi Ticaret A.S. produces and sells soft drinks in Turkey and internationally. It offers carbonated, non-carbonated, and energy drinks; and mineral and spring water products. The company distributes and markets its products through distributor companies and dealers under the Kristal COLA, CHAT COLA, RED LINE, Kristal, and Balsa brand names. Kristal Kola ve Mesrubat Sanayi Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1994 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

2.Name: Mr. Siddik  Durdu
2.Title: Exec. Director in Charge of Financial Affairs & Exec. Director
